architectural_elements.name: Hidden Bookshelf Door
architectural_elements.description: A bookshelf that swings open to reveal the secret study, triggered by a hidden lever or book.

architectural_elements.name: Wooden Paneling
architectural_elements.description: Dark, ornate wooden panels lining the walls, some with hidden compartments or carvings.

architectural_elements.name: High Ceiling with Moldings
architectural_elements.description: Decorative ceiling moldings with cracks, peeling gold leaf, and cobwebs.

architectural_elements.name: Small Stained-Glass Window
architectural_elements.description: A single, dimly lit stained-glass window with eerie or occult symbols.

architectural_elements.name: Stone or Wooden Floor
architectural_elements.description: A mix of stone tiles and wooden planks, with mysterious stains, scratches, or symbols etched into the surface.

furniture_and_decor.name: Antique Desk
furniture_and_decor.description: A large, ornate desk with drawers, ink stains, and a leather writing surface. Some drawers may be locked.

furniture_and_decor.name: Leather Armchair
furniture_and_decor.description: A worn, high-backed armchair with cracks in the leather, positioned near the desk.

furniture_and_decor.name: Bookshelves
furniture_and_decor.description: Floor-to-ceiling shelves filled with ancient, leather-bound books, some chained or marked with occult symbols.

furniture_and_decor.name: Globe
furniture_and_decor.description: An antique globe, possibly spinning on its own or marked with strange locations.

furniture_and_decor.name: Candelabras
furniture_and_decor.description: Iron or brass candelabras with flickering candles, casting eerie shadows.

atmospheric_details.name: Cobwebs
atmospheric_details.description: Thick cobwebs draped across the bookshelves, desk, and ceiling corners.

atmospheric_details.name: Dust Particles
atmospheric_details.description: Floating in the air, visible in the dim candlelight.

atmospheric_details.name: Flickering Lights
atmospheric_details.description: Candles or lanterns casting uneven, flickering light, creating long, shifting shadows.

atmospheric_details.name: Ghostly Whispers
atmospheric_details.description: Faint whispers, the sound of pages turning, or distant murmurs from unseen figures.

atmospheric_details.name: Cold Spots
atmospheric_details.description: Sudden chills near the desk or bookshelves, with visible breath in the air.

interactive_objects.name: Ancient Tome
interactive_objects.description: A large, chained book on the desk or shelf, filled with forbidden knowledge or puzzles.

interactive_objects.name: Rusty Key
interactive_objects.description: A key hidden in a desk drawer, inside a book, or behind a loose panel.

interactive_objects.name: Parchment or Letter
interactive_objects.description: A yellowed parchment or letter on the desk, containing clues or cryptic messages.

interactive_objects.name: Occult Artifacts
interactive_objects.description: Strange objects like a crystal ball, tarot cards, or a pentagram necklace hidden in drawers or on shelves.

interactive_objects.name: Hidden Compartment
interactive_objects.description: A secret drawer in the desk or a loose panel in the wall, containing a map, key, or artifact.

environmental_effects.name: Drafts
environmental_effects.description: Papers or curtains moving as if pushed by an unseen force.

environmental_effects.name: Fog
environmental_effects.description: A thin layer of mist near the floor, especially around the desk or bookshelves.

environmental_effects.name: Bloodstains or Ink Blots
environmental_effects.description: Mysterious stains on the desk, floor, or parchment, hinting at past rituals or violence.

environmental_effects.name: Falling Ash
environmental_effects.description: Ash or dust drifting down from the ceiling or shelves, especially when disturbed.

lighting.name: Candlelight
lighting.description: Flickering candles on the desk or candelabras, casting eerie, dancing shadows.

lighting.name: Moonlight
lighting.description: Faint moonlight filtering through the stained-glass window, casting colored shadows.

lighting.name: Ghostly Glow
lighting.description: A faint, eerie glow emanating from occult artifacts or certain books.
